attributes.action: Ensure Jeremy Corbyn isn't forced to resign by the Labour Party.
attributes.background: 57 Labour MPs have signed a letter requesting Corbyn to resign. 20 out of 31 members of the Labour Shadow Cabinet have resigned. Tomorrow there will be a secret ballot for MPs to give a vote of no-confidence in Corbyn. We need Corbyn in government and we need the Labour party to not force him out.

rejection.details: The leadership of the Labour party is an internal party matter, and is not something that the Government or Parliament as a whole is responsible for.
